title: New Evelynn Skin?
body: I think many would agree that a new Evelynn skin is well over-due. I'm dying to buy a skin for her, but don't think any of her skins are satisfactory for purchase as there isn't even a skin which costs over 750RP. Please put this into your thoughts and think of an Evelynn skin concept, i'm sure many would be fascinated.

replies.body: safecracker reasonable recent (last year!?) so older champs going to get one 1st

She needs a visual update first.

We were promised that she'd get a Visual Update before getting a new skin, then we got Safe Cracker so that promise was destroyed.

She desperately NEEDS a VU first.

Oh and Masquerade is best skin.
